content.description: A nonideal spring is fixed to a wall. A small bumper on the end of the spring is initially at position <math alttext="x equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> when the spring is at its equilibrium length, as shown. When the spring is compressed a distance <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"> <mi>x</mi> </math> from equilibrium, the elastic potential energy <math alttext="U sub s" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>s</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> of the spring in joules is given by <math alttext="U sub s equals, 3 times x cubed minus 4 times x squared, plus 2 x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>s</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mstyle></math>.
content.question: What is the spring force <math alttext="F sub s" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>s</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> as a function of <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"> <mi>x</mi> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="F sub s equals, 9 times x squared minus 8 x, plus 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>s</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></math>

<math alttext="F sub s equals, negative 9 times x squared plus 8 x, minus 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>s</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math>

<math alttext="F sub s equals, three fourths times x to the fourth power, minus four thirds times x cubed, plus x squared" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>s</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

<math alttext="F sub s equals, negative three fourths times x to the fourth power, plus four thirds times x cubed, minus x squared" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>s</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="F sub s equals, negative 9 times x squared plus 8 x, minus 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mtext>s</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
